2016.xerneas.bundle.3: Xerneas can power up your Benched Pokémon with Geomancy, or hit hard with Rainbow Spear! This bundle also includes two 10-card booster packs from Pokémon TCG: XY—BREAKthrough, plus a Xerneas coin, card sleeves, and deck box. Seize the power of Geomancy with Xerneas today!
2016.xerneas.bundle.4: This bundle contains: 2 Pokémon TCG: XY—BREAKthrough booster packs (10-card) 1 foil Xerneas Pokémon card (Black Star Promo, XY05) 1 Xerneas coin Matching deck box and card sleeves featuring Xerneas These cards are legal for Standard format tournaments and competition. This offer runs through August 8, 2017. This bundle is only available in the Pokémon TCG Online and is not sold in retail stores as a physical product.
2017.avatar.shiny-tapu-koko.description: Show off Tapu Koko's rare Shiny coloring with the Shiny Tapu Koko Trainer Set.
challenge.tournamentwins.info: Wins in tournament matches in any round count toward this challenge.
